column4: Hello, I'm quite new to Linux.  Windows is my bread and butter.  I think I have a driver for my webcam but it is a .gz file.  Can anyone help me install it please?
Which webcam (or chipset) are you using? The reason I ask is that most drivers are already availible as kernel modules. You just need to activate them.
I have the Quickcam Messanger from Logitech
http://www.kuhrti.de/index.php/article/logitech-quickcam-messenger-on-ubuntu-9-04/ <= this may be exactly what you need.
